properties.name: TEMPORARY
properties.description: Used for storage with no guarantee of persistence.

properties.name: PERSISTENT
properties.description: Used for storage that should not be removed by the user agent without application or user permission.

properties.name: requestFileSystem
properties.description: Requests a filesystem in which to store application data.

properties.name: resolveLocalFileSystemURL
properties.description: Allows the user to look up the Entry for a file or directory referred to by a local URL.
